name: Viddler
description: Viddler is a video site that allows users to upload, enhance and share their video from their browser. The site charges premium fees to users who want to use upgraded features, and also allows users to upload in bulk, add deep tags at specific times during videos and record directly from their webcam. In November 2007 viddler introduced an ad system enabling advertisers to bid on videos with relevant keyword tags about the whole video or a specific point in time during the video with the keyword tag in question.  As part of the ad system rollout, uploaders can also sign up to partner in a revenue share with viddler for advertising served during their videos.

apis.name: Viddler  API
apis.description: The Viddler API exposes Viddler’s key features to those that would like to build custom solutions on top of Viddler’s video platform.
